text: Party : Hulu Players : Margaret Atwood ; Emmy winners Elisabeth Moss, Ann Dowd with the entire Handmaid's Tale cast Place : Otium Spread : Sliders and rose macaroons Inside Dish :'' Historic.'' That's the word of the night at Hulu's Emmy party at Otium on downtown L. A. Hulu head of originals Beatrice Springborn tells THR she lost her peripheral vision when The Handmaid's Tale — which she developed — became the first streaming show to win best drama, beating competition from Netflix and its $ 6 billion originals budget. ` ` It feels historic and that we did it with my favorite writer, Margaret Atwood, is amazing.''
